name: Digital Footprints
description:
Digital Footprints is a puzzle-simulation game that aims to educate and raise awareness on the importance of Digital Data Privacy.

In this game, you are tasked with looking identifying and correcting common data privacy mistakes made on social media. 

This game was developed in partial fulfillment of our undergraduate thesis at Ateneo de Manila University. We would like to thank Sir Diy and Dr. Rodrigo for guiding us through this study.

Developed by Li Arceo and Lance Co

Before playing, please fill up this survey form.

https://bit.ly/ArceoCoThesisPrePlaySurvey
